Title: Provides inmates with access to breast cancer screenings and information about breast self-examinations
Summary: Provides inmates with access to breast cancer screenings every two years and information about breast self-examinations.
LawCode: Add ยง626, amd ยง140, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing inmates with access to breast cancer screenings and information about breast self-examinations
